org.trianacode.gui.hci

Class CompileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.CompileHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterWindowListener

    public class CompileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParameterWindowListener
    The class responsible for co-ordinating the compiling of tools and the generation of tool XML

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompileHandler(boolean automatedCompile, ToolTable tools)
      Construct a compile handler that will be used to automatically compile tools.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompileHandler

        public CompileHandler(boolean automatedCompile,
              ToolTable tools)
        Construct a compile handler that will be used to automatically compile tools. Set the tool and then call compile, errors will be reported but ignored, messages will be appended to a dialog.
        Parameters:
        automatedCompile - if true reports will be append to a dialog and compilation won't be interupted

      • CompileHandler

        public CompileHandler(Tool tool,
              ToolTable tools)
        Construct a compiler handler for compiling a specified tool
